name: Asteroids: Remastered
description:
Shoot asteroids and try to survive the 3 different difficulty levels in this remastered version of the classic game Asteroids.

We've added a new mechanic : a second shot type! Shoot different asteroids with this one!

Controls (play with XboX controller)

RT or LT + Left joystick - Dodge 

RT - Move forward / Acceleration

Left joystick : Camera / Aim

A - 1st Shoot 

B - 2nd Shoot
